snippet.title: LEGO Minecraft
snippet.description: Introducing Flexi-Play the latest update to our HooplAR solution. Enable users to choose how they want to play, in either AR or 3D, minimising drop-off from camera access rejections & allowing for desktop play as well. This upgrade provides users the freedom to interact in the way that suits them. Get in touch for more info!
